      Method is used to get the next greater BitVector of the given BitVector, for example next greater BitVector of 101 is 110
      Methods in hr.fer.zemris.trisat with parameters of type BitVector

      boolean HelperFunctions.hasGreater(BitVector current)
      Method is used to find if the current BitVector has a greater BitVector than him for example 100 has a greater and it is 101, but vector 111 doesn't have a greater representation using 3 bits
      boolean SATFormula.isSatisfied(BitVector assignment)
      Method is used to check if the formula is satisfied by the given BitVector object

      Checks if the Clause is satisfied with the given BitVector
      BitVector HelperFunctions.nextGreater(BitVector current)
      Method is used to get the next greater BitVector of the given BitVector, for example next greater BitVector of 101 is 110
      void SATFormulaStats.setAssignment(BitVector assignment, boolean updatePercentages)
